typedef vector<vector<ll> > matrix;
template<class T> inline void umax (T &a,T b) { if(a<b) a = b; }
template<class T> inline void umin (T &a,T b) { if(a>b) a = b; }
template<class T> inline T max (T a, T b, T c) { return max(a, max(b, c)); }
template<class T> inline T min (T a, T b, T c) { return min(a, min(b, c)); }

int LCS(string A, string B)
{
	int n = A.size();
	int m = B.size();
	int DP[n+1][m+1];
	clear(DP, 0);

	for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)
	{
		for (int j = 0; j <= m; j++)
		{
			if (i == 0 || j == 0)
				DP[i][j] = 0;
			else if (A[i - 1] == B[j - 1])
				DP[i][j] = DP[i - 1][j - 1] + 1;
			else
				DP[i][j] = max(DP[i - 1][j], DP[i][j - 1]);
		}
	}
	return DP[n][m];
}

static short DP[451][451][451] = {0};
int LCS(string A, string B, string C)
{
	int n = A.size();
	int m = B.size();
	int o = C.size();

	for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)
	{
		for (int j = 0; j <= m; j++)
		{
			for (int k = 0; k <= o; k++)
			{
				if (i == 0 || j == 0 || k == 0)
					DP[i][j][k] = 0;
				else if ((A[i - 1] == B[j - 1]) && (C[k - 1] == B[j - 1]))
					DP[i][j][k] = DP[i - 1][j - 1][k - 1] + 1;
				else
					DP[i][j][k] = max(DP[i - 1][j][k], max(DP[i][j - 1][k], DP[i][j][k - 1]));
			}
		}
	}
	return DP[n][m][o];
}

int main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
    #ifdef DEBUG
        freopen("in", "r", stdin);
        if (argc > 1)
        	freopen("out", "w", stdout);
    #endif
    int t;
    string s1, s2, s3;

    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
 	   	cin >> s1 >> s2 >> s3;	
    	int cc = LCS(s1, s2, s3);
    	int pp = s1.size();
    	cout << (pp - cc) * 3 << endl;
	}

    #ifdef DEBUG
        fclose(stdout);
    #endif
    return 0;
}
